name: The Office (Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2)
description:
The Office was made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2.

Play as an office employee and finish tasks before the work day ends.

Finish tasks to earn income.

Click the X in the top right corner of the tasks to close them, but lose income. 

Press Esc to Pause.

Thumbnail image by https://alte.itch.io/annako-rooms

Background Music by Benjamin Tissot (also known as Bensound)
